mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (memberid, username, nickname, userid, password, email, phonenumber, birth, createdtime, recessaccess, role) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, #{birth}, #{createdTime}, #{recessAccess}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE nickname = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE userid = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE phonenumber = #{phoneNumber}
